msg: initial implementation of Load/Save settings, the main window now
configures itself to the previous location/size on startup.

author: psmith
msg: For the usage of RemoteHost as a Tab name, should remove the source
Port, otherwise the number of tabs increases when a new socket is
created from the same source.  Rather annoying.

msg: Basic shell of the Settings stuff.  Very much a WIP.

pane, if it can't find anything else to use.
